remarks: The finite hull of a product of modules is additionally closed under scalar multiplication and thus is a linear subspace of the product. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dsmmlss.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
dsmmlss.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. Ring ) $.
dsmmlss.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> LMod ) $.
dsmmlss.k $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( Scalar ` ( R ` x ) ) = S ) $.
dsmmlss.p $e |- P = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
dsmmlss.u $e |- U = ( LSubSp ` P ) $.
dsmmlss.h $e |- H = ( Base ` ( S (+)m R ) ) $.
dsmmlss $p |- ( ph -> H e. U ) $.
$d H x $.
$d I x $.
$d P x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
